docs.lead_paragraph: Scientists have calculated that if people address certain risks, a significant number of Alzheimer’s cases could be prevented, with the operative word being “could.”

headline.seo: ‘7 Things You Can Do to Fight Alzheimer’s’ Isn’t So Certain
headline.main: Grasping for Any Way to Prevent Alzheimer’s
headline.print_headline: Grasping for Any Way To Prevent Alzheimer’s

docs.snippet: Scientists have calculated that if people address certain risks, a significant number of Alzheimer’s cases could be prevented, with the operative word being “could.”

docs.lead_paragraph: A reader responds to an article on a phony program ran by The Central Intelligence Agency in Pakistan to obtain DNA from the Bin Laden family.

docs.lead_paragraph: Scientists believe that male contraceptives hold promise for being safe, effective and reversible.
